resources.string:
Hi, my name is Aleks. 

I love fish 

The kind that is alive and swims around in a aquarium or river, or lake and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 
I like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much 
And sometimes even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even catch a large salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask me else about fishing, though.
